name: Monkey Business (itch) (CosmicLads)
description:
Hundreds of monkeys have been trapped in a building with no way to get out by an evil corporation, and are being forced to work all day! Save monkeys for them to help you become strong enough to break through the floors (and maybe snack on a banana or two on the way) to stop the corrupt business's plans!

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-5

This game is by:

Mattheenstra (Main Coder) https://mattheenstra.itch.io/

Doodlz (Main 2D Artist) https://linktr.ee/Doodlz

Snak (Main 3D Artist) https://linktr.ee/Traveler_Snak

Shim Shei (Main Level Designer, Main Composer) https://linktr.ee/shim_shei
